TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit RegiisUtility extends System.Object implements class System.Web.Management.IRegiisUtility

Docs.summary: Provides authorization utilities to support specific Web-application configuration, assembly registration, and assembly-key container manipulation. This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The <xref:System.Web.Management.RegiisUtility> class provides utility functions that support the `system.web` assembly registration.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The <xref:System.Web.Management.RegiisUtility.%23ctor%2A> constructor is not intended to be used directly from your code. It is based on the <xref:System.Web.Management.IRegiisUtility> interface.

MemberSignature.Value: public void ProtectedConfigAction (long options, string firstArgument, string secondArgument, string providerName, string appPath, string site, string cspOrLocation, int keySize, out IntPtr exception);

.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void ProtectedConfigAction(int64 options, string firstArgument, string secondArgument, string providerName, string appPath, string site, string cspOrLocation, int32 keySize, native int exception) cil managed

Docs.param: The type of action to perform.
A configuration section or assembly-key container name.
The configuration file name or account name.
Docs.summary: Allows specific manipulation of configuration sections and assembly-key containers based on the supplied parameters.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The <xref:System.Web.Management.RegiisUtility.ProtectedConfigAction%2A> method is used internally to protect and unprotect sections within the configuration. The <xref:System.Web.Management.RegiisUtility.ProtectedConfigAction%2A> method also supports assembly-key container manipulation.

MemberSignature.Value: public void RegisterAsnetMmcAssembly (int doReg, string typeName, string binaryDirectory, out IntPtr exception);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void RegisterAsnetMmcAssembly(int32 doReg, string typeName, string binaryDirectory, native int exception) cil managed

Docs.param: 0 indicates that the assembly should be unregistered; otherwise, the assembly should be registered.
The path of the binary directory.
Docs.summary: Allows the executing Microsoft Management Console (MMC) assembly to be registered or unregistered.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Used internally to register or unregister the executing MMC assembly.

MemberSignature.Value: public void RegisterSystemWebAssembly (int doReg, out IntPtr exception);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void RegisterSystemWebAssembly(int32 doReg, native int exception) cil managed

Docs.param: 0 indicates that the assembly should be unregistered; otherwise, the assembly should be registered.
Docs.summary: Allows the executing Web assembly to be registered or unregistered.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Used to register or unregister the executing Web assembly.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void RemoveBrowserCaps(native int exception) cil managed

Docs.summary: Allows the browser-capabilities code generator to be uninstalled.
